events.message: The customer reported a car collision on the highway resulting in significant damage to the vehicle.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the information regarding the vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle the auto accident claim and to coordinate with the customer.
The customer was notified that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is under process.
Requested the customer to submit the police report and car repair estimates for further processing.
The customer submitted all required documents including accident photos and repair bills promptly.
An investigation has commenced to verify the details and assess the extent of the damage to the vehicle.
Investigation completed successfully confirming the claims as valid and the damage assessments accurate.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on the approved damage estimates and policy coverage.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the handling of their auto accident claim.
The claim was officially approved for payment following review of all documents and customer acceptance.
Payment was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover the vehicle repair costs as per the approved claim.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after successful payment and no further actions pending.
All records and documents related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
